Summary: Registration form submits with empty password field
Description: Frontend validation not preventing form submission when password field is empty
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to /signup
2. Enter valid email and name
3. Leave password field empty
4. Click 'Sign Up' button
Expected Result: Form should show error 'Password is required' and block submission
Actual Result: Form submits to backend and returns HTTP 500 error. User sees generic error message.

Summary: Avatar upload crashes browser on files > 15MB
Description: No client-side file size validation causes browser to crash when uploading large files
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Profile > Edit
2. Click Upload Avatar
3. Select image file larger than 15MB
4. Browser tab freezes and crashes
Expected Result: Show error 'File size must be under 10MB' immediately after selection
Actual Result: Browser tab freezes for 30+ seconds then crashes. Unsaved form data is lost.

Summary: JWT token remains valid after 30 minutes idle
Description: Session token expiration not enforced. Users stay logged in indefinitely.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login to account
2. Wait 35 minutes without any activity
3. Perform action requiring authentication
4. Observe the action succeeds
Expected Result: Session should expire after 30 minutes. User redirected to login with message 'Session expired'.
Actual Result: User remains logged in. Protected API calls succeed. Token never expires.

Summary: Settings page shows white background in dark mode
Description: Settings page CSS not updated for dark mode. Missing .dark.module.css file.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Enable dark mode from theme toggle
2. Navigate to Settings page
3. Observe background color
Expected Result: Dark background (#1a1a2e) with light text (#e0e0e0)
Actual Result: White background (#ffffff) making dark text nearly invisible

Summary: Password reset link works after 24 hours
Description: Reset token expiration not validated. Security vulnerability.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Request password reset
2. Wait 24+ hours
3. Click reset link from email
4. Observe link still works
Expected Result: Reset link should expire after 1 hour with error 'Link expired'
Actual Result: Link works indefinitely. Password can be reset days after request.

Summary: Login rate limiting not working
Description: Failed login attempts not being tracked. Account lockout not triggering.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Enter valid email
2. Enter wrong password
3. Repeat 10+ times rapidly
4. Observe no lockout
Expected Result: Account should lock after 5 failed attempts for 15 minutes
Actual Result: No lockout occurs. Unlimited password attempts allowed.

Summary: Email verification link case-sensitive
Description: Verification fails if user email capitalized differently than registration
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Register with email 'User@Example.com'
2. Click verification link
3. System shows 'Invalid token'
Expected Result: Email comparison should be case-insensitive
Actual Result: Verification fails if email stored differently than token lookup

Summary: Profile bio allows HTML injection
Description: User-entered HTML not sanitized. XSS vulnerability.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Edit profile
2. Enter bio: '<script>alert(1)</script>'
3. Save profile
4. View profile in another browser
Expected Result: HTML should be escaped and displayed as plain text
Actual Result: Script tag rendered and executes. XSS attack successful.

Summary: Avatar not displaying on mobile Safari
Description: WebP avatar images not loading on iOS Safari
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Upload avatar in WebP format
2. View profile on iPhone Safari
3. Avatar shows as broken image
Expected Result: Avatar should display correctly or fallback to JPEG
Actual Result: Broken image icon displayed. No fallback image.

Summary: Skills autocomplete dropdown off-screen
Description: Autocomplete suggestions render below viewport on small screens
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Edit profile on mobile (375px)
2. Click skills input field
3. Start typing skill name
4. Dropdown appears below visible area
Expected Result: Dropdown should appear above input if not enough space below
Actual Result: Dropdown renders off-screen. User cannot see or select suggestions.

Summary: 2FA backup codes visible in page source
Description: Backup codes rendered in HTML without masking. Visible via View Source.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Enable 2FA
2. View backup codes step
3. Right-click > View Page Source
4. Search for backup codes
Expected Result: Codes should be masked or encrypted client-side
Actual Result: All 10 backup codes visible in plain text in HTML source

Summary: Password change allows same password
Description: User can 'change' password to current password. No history check.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Security settings
2. Enter current password
3. Enter same password as new password
4. Confirm and save
Expected Result: Error: 'New password must be different from current password'
Actual Result: Password change succeeds even though passwords are identical

Summary: Delete account works with active contracts
Description: Account deletion allowed even when user has active projects
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Have active contract as freelancer
2. Go to Account settings
3. Request account deletion
4. Enter password and confirm
Expected Result: Error: 'Cannot delete account with active contracts'
Actual Result: Account deleted. Orphaned contracts left in database.

Summary: Notification preferences not persisting
Description: Email notification toggles reset after page refresh
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Notification settings
2. Disable email notifications
3. Refresh page
4. Check notification toggles
Expected Result: Toggles should remain in disabled state
Actual Result: All toggles reset to enabled after page refresh

Summary: Login history shows incorrect timezone
Description: All login times displayed in UTC instead of user's local timezone
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login from EST timezone
2. View login history
3. Check login time
Expected Result: Time should display in user's local timezone (EST)
Actual Result: Time shows in UTC. 5 hours ahead of actual login time.

Summary: Social login creates duplicate accounts
Description: Google login creates new account even if email already registered
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Register with email 'user@gmail.com'
2. Later click 'Sign in with Google'
3. Use same Gmail account
Expected Result: Accounts should link automatically if email matches
Actual Result: New duplicate account created. Two accounts with same email.

Summary: Profile page 404 for special characters in name
Description: URLs break when username contains special characters
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Register with name containing apostrophe: O'Connor
2. View public profile
3. Profile page returns 404
Expected Result: Special characters should be URL-encoded properly
Actual Result: 404 error. URL malformed with unescaped apostrophe.

Summary: Dark mode flash on page load
Description: White flash appears briefly before dark mode applies on page navigation
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Enable dark mode
2. Navigate to different page
3. Observe brief white flash
Expected Result: Page should load directly in dark mode without flash
Actual Result: 300ms white flash visible on every page transition

Summary: Form loses data on session timeout
Description: Editing profile with expired session loses all unsaved changes
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Start editing profile
2. Fill in bio and skills (don't save)
3. Wait for session to expire (30 min)
4. Click Save
Expected Result: Prompt to login then restore form data after auth
Actual Result: Form cleared completely. All unsaved data lost. No recovery.

Summary: Accessibility: Form labels missing for screen readers
Description: Input fields missing associated labels. WCAG 2.1 AA violation.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Use screen reader (NVDA/JAWS)
2. Navigate to registration form
3. Tab through form fields
Expected Result: Screen reader announces: 'Email, text input required'
Actual Result: Screen reader only announces: 'Edit text'. No context.
